(1) Use; Appointment.

(5) Efforts; Effectiveness.
(6) Governance; management.

(8) Act; act.

(11) Function; function.

(16) Make, let.

(18) Still do.
(19) Still have.
(20) Trust.
(21) Adverbs. Youcai. Just now.
(22) Adverbs. Still only. only.
(23) Prepositions. Still speaking. Indicates reliance or reason.
(24) Prepositions. Youyou. Represents the premises.
(25) Prepositions. Still in. Indicates the time.
(26) Conjunctions. Therefore; therefore.
(27) Interrogative pronouns. Juho. Indicates a rhetorical question.
